name: Recess Race
description:
Recess Race is a 2D platformer race that takes place in an elementary school. You play Fitz, an imaginative 3rd grader who just wants to play. Race to the finish while picking up as much trash as you can (the school administration may have organised this to clean up the yard...)!

Watch out, though - your nemeses, the bullies, will try to stop you from getting to the end. Jump, tumble and run past them and get to the end first!

Press Z to Jump and X to use items!
